hooks.command: echo "$1" | jq -r '.tool_input.command' | grep -E '^git\s+(add|commit|push|checkout|merge|pull|fetch|branch|reset|rebase)' >/dev/null && { echo 'ERROR: Direct git commands are not allowed!' >&2; echo 'Use PatchManager instead:' >&2; echo '  - New-QuickFix for minor changes' >&2; echo '  - New-Feature for new functionality' >&2; echo '  - New-Patch for other changes' >&2; exit 2; } || exit 0

mkdir -p ~/.claude && echo '1' >> ~/.claude/edit-count.log && count=$(wc -l < ~/.claude/edit-count.log) && if [ "$count" -ge 10 ]; then echo "WARNING: You have made $count file edits without committing!" >&2; echo "Please commit your work using PatchManager:" >&2; echo "  pwsh -c 'Import-Module ./aither-core/modules/PatchManager; New-QuickFix -Description \"Save progress\" -Changes { }'" >&2; exit 2; fi

cd /workspaces/AitherZero 2>/dev/null && changes=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l) && if [ "$changes" -gt 0 ]; then echo '{}' | jq -c '{decision: "block", reason: "You have '"$changes"' uncommitted changes. Please commit using: Import-Module ./aither-core/modules/PatchManager; New-QuickFix -Description \"Save work\" -Changes { }"}'; fi
